messages.content: I need help setting up replication between two S3 buckets: my-production-data-bucket and my-backup-data-bucket. The source bucket has sensitive data and I want to ensure proper encryption. Also, I have another bucket analytics-results-bucket that stores processed data. What's the best practice for this setup?

system: You are an AWS S3 expert. Provide detailed guidance on S3 bucket configuration and best practices.
